namespace {{ namespacename }};

public class Delete{{ modelname }}CommandValidator : AbstractValidator<Delete{{ modelname }}Command>
{
        public Delete{{ modelname }}CommandValidator()
        {
          
        RuleFor(v => v.Id)
            .NotNull().WithMessage("Ids cannot be null.")
            .NotEmpty().WithMessage("Ids cannot be an empty array.")
            .ForEach(guid => guid
                .NotEqual(Guid.Empty).WithMessage("Ids must not contain empty Guids.")
            );
          
        }
}
